message.body: Hey can u come look at a job with me today or tomorrow? I will let u know. Installing security door and trim
Maybe. Just heard from michael on some work but I'll get back to you in an hour or so
Ok , if like to give you the bulk of the work if I get it. It would be good for u to see it. Sometime in the next month we can fit it in a lull
Cool. I think I'm supposed to help michael with something today and tomorrow but I will contact you once I talk to him and we can work something out. Thanks a bunch.
